properties.title: Pump track Muttenz
properties.abstract: The asphalt pump track in Muttenz can be ridden on anything with wheels. The integrated bowl makes the track exciting even for experts who want to practice their tricks and jumps here.
properties.description:
The Muttenz (BL) pump track is one of the first asphalt tracks in the region. Thanks to its surface, it can be ridden on a variety of bikes: even the little ones can do their laps on balance bikes, while the older visitors can use scooters, inline skates or skateboards as well as mountain bikes. 

The pump track is situated right next to the indoor swimming pool and the beach volleyball court. A special feature is the integrated bowl: together with the entrances and exits, it offers a highlight for all those who want to perfect their tricks and jumps. 

Since October 2020, the pump track has been freely accessible and has also been actively used since then.
properties.name: Verein Pumptrack Muttenz
